Politics.Headline: "Lib Dems Guarantee Free Unicorn Rides and Magic Healthcare in Election Manifesto"
Politics.Article: In a shocking turn of events, the Liberal Democrats have promised voters the impossible in their latest manifesto. Alongside pledges on NHS and social care, the party has promised free unicorn rides and healthcare powered by magic. Critics call it a "fairytale" of an election promise.

General.Headline: "One Shot Wonder: Miracle Cure for Every Ailment Discovered"
General.Article: In a groundbreaking development, researchers have discovered a two-in-one flu and Covid jab that promises to rid the world of all illnesses. Doses of the magical elixir are said to allow recipients to live forever in perfect health, overthrowing the need for doctors altogether.
